item.title: Why I Write Go
item.description: tl;dr: This is not a rant about how Go is “superior” to other languages. It’s all apples and oranges and I like them both, not at the same time, ofcourse! üçé/üçä off-topic: When I was a little boy üë¶, I used to play all day long with my legos - constructing buildings, trucks, everything that I could imagine. Chaining dominoes with my parent’s music collection cassettes, solving jigsaw puzzles and playing scrabble with my cousins.
